name: Creamy Mac and Cheese
about: Ultra creamy homemade mac and cheese with a crispy breadcrumb topping. Comfort food at its finest.
steps: Cook macaroni until al dente. Drain.
Melt butter in a saucepan. Whisk in flour and cook for 1 minute (roux).
Gradually whisk in milk until smooth. Simmer until thickened.
Remove from heat and stir in the cheeses until melted.
Combine sauce and pasta. Transfer to a baking dish.
Top with breadcrumbs and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 20 minutes until golden.
